title: 2020: A Sports-Less Odyssey
description: Hot Takedown looks at the effect of the coronavirus pandemic on both leagues and fans, and our Rabbit Hole remembers when sports were stopped in the past.

itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
